raw_body: RANASINGHE,​ NORMAN MATTHEW – Beloved husband of Dr. Paxie (Ranaweera),​ son of the late Richard and Stephanie Ranasinghe,​ dearest father of Shalendra,​ Dinuke and Roshie,​ grandfather of Ruby,​ Olivia,​ Ori,​ Alexander and Joshua,​ brother of Leonard (Deceased),​ Anita (Deceased),​ Maurice (Deceased) and of Elmo and Iranganie,​ expired in Sydney Australia. d​o​c​t​o​r​p​a​x​i​e​@​a​o​l​.​c​o​m​057798
